wz:next.visible: !#empty(newProduct.code) and newProduct.catalogVersion != null and newProduct.baseProduct != null and newProduct.mainEan != null and newProduct.technicalIngredients != null and newProduct.colourPosition != null

wz:done.visible: !#empty(newProduct.code) and newProduct.catalogVersion != null and newProduct.baseProduct != null and newProduct.mainEan != null and newProduct.technicalIngredients != null and newProduct.colourPosition != null
newItem.facetSearchConfig != null AND newItem.matchType != null AND !#empty(newItem.keyword) AND newItem.ignoreCase != null AND newItem.redirect != null AND newItem.language != null
newMarkDownPriceRow.product != null and newMarkDownPriceRow.endTime != null and newMarkDownPriceRow.startTime != null and newMarkDownPriceRow.price > 0
